title: Pipestone National Monument: Camping
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Eating & Sleeping     Camping              Campgrounds       There is no campground at Pipestone National Monument.  Local Pipestone and State Park campgrounds are available at these nearby locations. Pipestone RV Campground Across from the park's entrance. Telephone 507-825-2455 Split Rock Creek State Park 6 miles south on Hwy 23 by Ihlen, MN. Telephone 507-348-7908 Blue Mounds State Park 23 miles south on Hwy 75 by Luverne, MN. Telephone 507-283-1307 Camden State Park 35 miles northeast on Hwy 23 by Marshall, MN. Telephone 507-865-4530 Websites with other camping/lodging options are:    http://www.exploreminnesota.com http://www.travelsd.com
